channel.title: Starting a Private server as a team :)
channel.description: Hello i'm Invision , i've thinking of this and it sounds awesome if any off u guys want to create a Private server like Soulsplit i can little coding i know how to fix the servers ip portforward and stuff but It would be awesome if me and some other could start a server write here or pm and then we can talk bout it :D

item.title: Starting a Private server as a team :)
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

InvisionThePro:

Actully this is general so you can talk what the love u want about , and i don’t give a shit about the grammar either i have a loveing life and will not loveing waste my life learning grammar

You imbecile. Perhaps if you took the time to read the rules, you wouldn’t be so wrong. There’s a dedicated section for private server development and this isn’t it. It’s even covered in our carefully written rules, which you obviously haven’t bothered to take a look over. As for grammar, I’m not perfect myself. I spend most of my time browsing these forums on my iPad and I mess up a fair bit. However, I continually make an effort. I don’t take the arrogant stance that you have.

From looking at the original post, it’s rather obvious how little you know. What would be the benefit of working with you? I don’t really see any. Let’s hope you’re banned next time I check this thread. If our moderators spent more time eliminating people like this instead of locking decent threads, perhaps our community would improve.

Read full topic
item.source: Starting a Private server as a team :)
